Package devices

Class Device

java.lang.Object
devices.Device
Direct Known Subclasses:
AirConditioner, Light, ObservableDevice, OldHeaterAdapter, Speaker
public abstract class Device extends Object
Device is the common interface for every smart device of the system.

      Makes the device run a given command.

    • getBaseType

      public abstract String getBaseType()
      Gives back a string with the base type of the device, ignoring eventual decorators.
      Returns:
      a string with the name of the base type of the device.
